message: Let's split fairly, I'll take a bit more
I understand you wanting a larger share, but it needs to be more equitable. This offer considers the time value of money.
Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than before. Take it before the money devalues further!
Alice, this is a fair offer considering the time pressure and devaluation of the money. Let's close the deal.
The money is devaluing fast for you, Bob. This is a good chance to settle before it's worth even less.
